name: Crystal Cave
description: A cave filled with natural crystals provides valuable materials and often magical properties, but the sharp crystals can cause serious injuries. The crystals may have healing or magical properties, while the reflective surfaces can create disorienting light effects.
atmosphere: Magical world of natural crystals creating dazzling light and beauty display. Cool air scented of earth, stone, and magical properties. Crystals create dazzling light and color with disorienting reflective effects. Sharp crystals cause serious injuries. Magical properties create wonder and potential power. Natural cathedral of crystal and light.
